title: entitydata
author: 840196733mw
txt_content:
把全图僵尸变成有1000血，穿着一件钻石胸甲，附魔是保护10，名字叫做 tank 死亡以后不会掉东西

急急急急急急急

replies.author: scorpio975
replies.txt_content:
840196733mw 发表于 2015-6-30 18:05
瞬间治疗会杀死亡灵的，是伤害/entitydata @e[type=Zombie] {Equipment:[{},{},{},{id:minecraft:diamond_chestplate,Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:10}]}},{}],DropChances:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],display:{Name:"tank"},Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:1000}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:7,Amplifier:100,Duration:60}]}复制代码

OK

replies.author: scorpio975
replies.txt_content:
僵尸的指令
/entitydata @e[type=Zombie] {ench:[{id:0,lvl:10}],display:{Name:"tank"},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1843155720,UUIDMost:1843155720,Amount:1000.0,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health}]}复制代码

怪物不掉东西需要用gamerule
/gamerule doMobLoot false复制代码

replies.author: 我是傻瓜l
replies.txt_content: 呃呃呃呃呃呃呃呃呃呃呃呃额

replies.author: scorpio975
replies.txt_content:
840196733mw 发表于 2015-6-29 18:12
不行，僵尸不是满血的，只有20血，怎么让僵尸满血/entitydata @e[type=Zombie] {Equipment:[{},{},{},{id:minecraft:diamond_chestplate,Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:10}]}},{}],DropChances:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],display:{Name:"tank"},Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:1000}]}复制代码

之前加的是装备属性，这次改成怪物属性
你试试看

replies.author: 840196733mw
replies.txt_content:
scorpio975 发表于 2015-6-29 19:40
之前加的是装备属性，这次改成怪物属性
你试试看
不行，不是满血的，要不给再加一个瞬间伤害100,3秒
这样应该可以补满血了
